name: debug
description: Debugging utilities, especially for LAMBDA objects.
searchIndex: debug Debugging utilities, especially for LAMBDA objects. ['debug', 'lambda', 'udt'] REPR Creates a string representation of any primitive type or UDT that implements "@repr".

REPR.definition:
=iferror(
  val("@repr"),
  choose(
    log(type(val), 2) + 1,
    val,
    """" & val & """",
    val,
    "#gsreserved",
    ERRORSTR(val),
    "#gsreserved",
    "{ " & join("; ", byrow(map(val, lambda(v, REPR(v))), lambda(row, join(", ", row)))) & " }",
    "#unknown"
  )
)
REPR.description: Creates a string representation of any primitive type or UDT that implements "@repr".

val.description: A primitive type or UDT that implements "@repr".
